abstract.para: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Doucette, Alfonso (2011): Dracula immunda (Orchidaceae: Pleurothallidinae), a new species from Panama. Phytotaxa 16: 37-44, DOI: 10.11646/phytotaxa.16.1.2, URL: http://biotaxa.org/Phytotaxa/article/view/phytotaxa.16.1.2
